thread.section_title: PolicyGenius Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PolicyGenius | policygenius.com
thread.title: Alexander Polson

author: Alexander Polson
title: Alexander Polson
text: The Policy Genius website was incredibly easy to use, well laid out and the options available to me were clear. Those that assisted with the process over email were very helpful and kind and they made sure that I was making progress on the steps I needed to take. Being a busy person those extra nudges really helped me follow through. I'll be using Policy Genius again to get life insurance for my wife in the next few months.
